docs.text: zend-skeleton-installer zend-skeleton-installer is a composer plugin for use in the initial install of the ZendSkeletonApplication. It prompts for common requirements, adding packages to the composer requirements for each selection, and then uninstalls itself on completion. The installer requires zend-component-installer , and we recommend requiring that component in your project skeleton as well. File issues at https://github.com/zendframework/zend-skeleton-installer/issues Documentation is at https://docs.zendframework.com/zend-skeleton-installer/
docs.title: zend-skeleton-installer
